transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Ha good morning sir. Nenu Akanksha India India mart nundi. Sir meeku last time cheppanu kada particular ga catalog team anedi em ledu sir. Meeku service gani catalog gani emanna update unte meeru naake direct number ke call cheyali. But meeru customer
Customer: Ninna meeku telustano avaledo
Executive: A ring antena
Customer: Direct number ke itta ring raledu. Meeru ninna holiday kada. Ledhu switch off pettaru switch off petti enduku cheste switch off vachindi. Tarvata nenu catalog team ki call chesthe ivala holiday ani chepparu.
Executive: Ade particular ga catalog chese vallu evaru leru. Adi services live ayyaka
Customer: Catalog team untaru kada meeru separate ga internal ga. Nenu mundu vachesanu meeku
Executive: Adi services services live avve mundu untadi. Services live ayyina tarvata account manager ki account vachesi anta nene chudanu.
Customer: Accha accha okay individual ga chestunnaru. Please gurthupettukondi next time nundi naake call cheyandi ok na. Ippudu cheppandi meeru sheet lo pampichinnadi adi kuda add cheyali and ippudu photos edo pampicharu kada adi separate aa?
Customer: Avunu sheet one sheet two add cheyali. So sheet one lo kinda chuste venakki ala last four items vadileseyandi ante last lo unnai kada. Endukante duplicate vastadi meeru second sheet lo kuda same products mata.
Executive: Okay
Customer: First sheet lo last podilu unnai kada
Executive: Last four aa? Aa pure turmeric powder aa
Customer: Last lo meeku ha podilu unnai kada enni untayandi last lo enni unnai avi?
Executive: Aa total 24 undi last lo pure turmeric powder undi tarvata karam podi undi. Black pepper powder kodo idli rava ragi idli

Customer: Okay. So first page lo authentic home made podi varieties unnai kada?
Executive: Hmm
Customer: First first tab lo
Executive: Aa
Customer: Avi podilu unnai kada aa podilanni delete chesesukondi first sheet lo. Endukante second sheet lo unnai kabatti.
Executive: Podi anedi okkate kanipistundi naakaithe karam podi ani undi adi okkate na?
Customer: Kaadu kaadu authentic home made podi varieties made from made freshly after your order ani cheppestundi kada. Last lo first sheet lo unnara meeru?
Executive: Aa one and one sheet one ante one raasundi kinda
Customer: Sheet one lo unnaru kada sheet one lo aa sheet one lo chudandi sheet one last ki vacheseste last patipani undi kada
Executive: Adi flax seed
Customer: Okay podis okay okay aa arthamaindi. Aa podis unnai kada avi delete chesesukondi.
Executive: Delete cheyala idanta
Customer: Authentic home made podi varieties unnaya?
Executive: Ha ha avi add cheyakoodada?
Customer: Aa aa sheet lo delete chesesukunte meeku second sheet lo entante duplicate undadu. Okay okay okay. So pani cheyandi ayite nenu line lo untanu aa podis anni delete chesesukondi first sheet lo confusion lekunda untadi.
Executive: Chestanu chestanu. Enni eight unnai kada eight delete chesesara?
Customer: Ha okay first sheet clear so first sheet as it is ga anni add cheyali. So now now ippudu em cheyalante second sheet ki vellandi. Daantlo unnavanni kuda add cheyali.

Executive: Okka nimisham
Executive: Second sheet lo second sheet lo aa five six seven eight nine aa second sheet lo 15 products unna 15 add cheyali.
Customer: Correct. Yes but the first sheet lo unna podis add cheyakoodadu.
Executive: Correct.
Customer: Antena?
Customer: Ha delete chesesaru kada ippudu adi first sheet lo delete aipoya?
Executive: Ha ha ha so so ika confusion pettukovaddu add cheyala add cheyakoodada ani delete aipoyindi kabatti.
Executive: And idi inkoti Andhra traditional and seasonal products undi adi add cheyali kada?
Customer: One second. Adi already add chesesanu moodu delete chesesanu. Adi kuda delete chesesukondi.
Executive: Aa jaggery unda delete chesesukontara?
Customer: Cheesesanu tarvata cheddam. First clear chesukoni aa aipoyindi. So Andhra traditional seasonal products delete chesesai mottam. Aa three products delete chesesai. So first sheet lo meeku last product emundi ippudu pure turmeric
Executive: Aa pure turmeric powder ikkadi varaku idanta add cheyali antenaa?
Customer: Yes yes yes so deeni sambandinchi second sheet lo 15 products undi aa 15 add cheyali.
Executive: Correct nenu ippudu pampichina images vachesi first sheet lo vi.
Executive: Okay
Executive: Anni unnaya andulo
Customer: First second sheet aa so soaps lo rendu rakalu unnai okati ledu. Hmm idi soaps lo listing lo meeru add chesara idi
Customer: Aa nenu add chesesanu multi millet upma rava vacuum packing ani
Executive: Avunu avunu avunu. See maximum nenu first page anni kuda add chesesanu. But entante naaku system allow cheyatledu 500 grams or 400 grams.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm okay. So avi naaku system allow cheyatledu some error chupistundi. Endulo em system ela chudali ippudu idi meeru total 13 products add chesinattu unnaaru. Aa so manaki so description tho vellipondi so multi millet add chesesanu 700 grams. Okasari cross check chesukondi chesukunevanni kuda yellow lo okaani paint
Customer: Yellow
Customer: Yellow gaani pettesukunte meeku adi easy aipothadi. First for example multi millets unda?
Executive: Hmm
Customer: Multi millets add chesana?
Executive: Okka nimisham check chestanu. Hmm first naakaithe grover page kanipistundi. Grover page kanipistundi. Aa koncham slow ga naaku arthamaindi nenu cross check chesukuntanu le.
Executive: Arthamainda? So weight kuda 700 grams correct ga ante update ayinda leda kuda chusukovali.
Executive: Hmm hmm grams kaani lekapothe kilos kaani nenu edaithe chesanu
Customer: Idi meeku eppudikalla kavali ante
Customer: Mee istam meeru chesukondi chesukondi meeku eppudikalla kavali Saturday holiday untadi Saturday cheyamantara lekapothe eerojuki eeroje kavala meeku?
Executive: Ledhu mee convenience chudandi mee convenience batti naaku ivvandi. Ee images okasari meeru internal ga okasari check chesukondi. Hmm hmm ante manam google lo teesukovacha lekapothe teesukokoodadu anedi naaku idea ledu. So last time em chesaru
Customer: So nenu chustanu google lo images ante avi edhi particular brand raasi undadu loose lo ayite nenu google nundi kuda add cheyagalanu.
Executive: Aa adi okasari chusukondi last time google vi cheyakoodadu ani annaru mari but okasari clarity teesukoni sarette naaku eppudu gistare ayite aa sare nenu add chestanu meeku update chestanu okasari cross check chesukomani sarena ayipoyina tarvata.
Customer: Aa hari hari hari ga chesesukokkarledu slow ga chesukuntu undandi koncham neat ga cheyandi. And idi photos pampicharu kada daani kindana second page images pedithe kindana akkada raaseyandi mundu second page images ani lekapothe anni mix aipothadi whatsapp lo.
Executive: Sare sarena second page di nenu second page em cheyaledu see tab two di ayite nenu ade sheet two di nenu em images pampinchaledu only tab sheet one di pampichanu.
Customer: Okay sare mari sheet two images google nundi add cheyamantara?
Executive: Aa avanni podile kada so unique ga pettukunte saripothadi. Hmm sare naaku next week complete ga meeru teesukunna parvaledu but koncham neat ga chesukondi. Aa parvaledu weekend lo aa weekend lone aipothadi.
Executive: Meeru kangaaru padakkarledu anta hadavidi padipoyi chesesukokkarledu just mee flexibility batti chesukondi. Sare sare okay okasari nenu idi ticket close chestunnanu meeru customer care ki call chesundi inkemanna doubts unte ya ya okay okay.
Executive: Em ledu em ledu vaallu ticket create chestunnaru ante nenu ninna call chesinappudu. Aa ade adi meeru customer care ki call cheste adi open avutundi sir. Ok na so please na number ke direct ga call cheyandi emanna issue unte. Sare sure sir okay meeku oka rating link vastadi andulo positive feedback ivvandi naaku ok na okay okay ya aa okay okay okay thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to add products to catalog.

- Customer wants to know about image usage policy.



Resolution:

- Executive guided on adding products to catalog.

- Executive clarified image usage policy.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, products, images, sheet
